item.description:
Fall is underway and it's the perfect time to visit a cornfield maze! Let's get together at Davis Mega Maze, which offers a complex course, featuring several different levels of intensity. There is more than one solution to the maze and it can take anywhere from 45 minutes to 3 hours to complete.

The hours are as follows:
Daytime Mazing -> 10am-6pm
Halloween "Fright Nights" -> 6:30-10pm

On October 20 the Fright Night will be specifically geared towards adults.

General admission is either $16.95 or $24.95 for adults, depending on when we go, with discounts for children, seniors, etc.

This year's theme is "Clue." From the website:

"A murder has occurred and YOUR detective skills will be put to the test as you question suspects, cross-examine stories, figure out how, where and who dunnit, while navigating the world's most complex, adventure cornfield maze!"

Please visit www.davisfarmland.com/megamaze for more information.

I am planning on bringing some homemade vegan donuts or donut holes, as well as some apple cider. Hope to see you there!
item.name: Davis Mega Maze 2012
